title: New: Outfit – Dashing In Passing
content:
Liverpool’s much hyped five piece Outfit have a new single in the form of the R’n’B influenced Dashing In Passing.

It’s funky, confident and if I’m honest, rather refreshing amongst a stuttering UK music scene failing to find itself in the modern digital age. There’s dream-pop inspirations on this new track, reminiscent of Twin Shadow, most notable in the reverb tinged vocals; a track sure to cement their profile as one of 2012’s acts to watch out for. Check out Dashing In Passing below, which features on their upcoming EP Another Night’s Dreams Reach Earth Again released April 2012 on The Sounds Of Sweet Nothing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
